title: Acquisition of a land to the Sri Lanka Police for the construction of the  Bulathsinhala Police Station
decision_details: - The proposal made by Hon. Sagala Ratnayake, the Minister of Law & Order and Southern Development, to vest a land in extent of 04 acres owned by the Horana Plantation Company situated in the Athura village in the Bulathsinhala Grama Niladhari Division with the Sri Lanka Police to construct a building to house the Bulathsinhala Police Station, presently functioning in a closed down school building, was approved by the Cabinet.
